:py:mod:`model._model_functions`
================================

.. py:module:: model._model_functions


Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   model._model_functions.load_retrain_model
   model._model_functions.load_model



.. py:function:: load_retrain_model(path, filename, X_retrain, y_retrain, early_stopping_point = None)

   Method to load and retrain persisted model
   :param path: path where the model is saved
   :param filename: filename of the model
   :param X_retrain: feature matrix for retraining
   :param y_retrain: target vector for retraining
   :param early_stopping_point: optional early stopping point relevant for some models
   :return: model instance


.. py:function:: load_model(path, filename)

   Method to load persisted model
   :param path: path where the model is saved
   :param filename: filename of the model
   :return: model instance
